name: Swingin' Rocks
description:
You are joined together by this rock – Yes a rock, your only weapon.  Fend off hoards of enemies to survive. There are different types of enemies so make sure you can avoid them all. Create momentum to hit enemies hard when they come for you, the more momentum you have the more damage you will deal.

The different enemies in this game are:

  • The wolf: it blends in well and has lots of health, but it can be taken out by hitting it hard enough.
  • The fox: it is the same as the wolf except that when it gets too close to you the fox will dash in your direction.
  • The boulder: This enemy is a little tricky to defeat because it can not be taken out by hitting it, instead you will have to hit it against a wall to do damage to it.

Have a good time playing!
